5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: ‘Abdullah bin Buraidah narrated that his father said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘The covenant that distinguishes between us and them is prayer; so whoever leaves it, he has committed Kufr.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ تَرَكَ الصَّلاَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning one who does not perform Prayer
